issue.title: [CF 1238] Maximum Soul Shards
issue.body:
Warlock Resources

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
TMW has the maximum number of Soul Shards as 4, the actual maximum number of Soul Shards is 6.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
8.0.3


> Posted by CurseForge user Draalei | Imported from CurseForge issue #1238 | Raw
